properties.name: slotbot.auth.token.name
properties.description: Name of the authentication token used to validate requests.

properties.name: slotbot.auth.token
properties.description: The token that should be used to validate requests.

properties.name: slotbot.discord.token
properties.description: The token of the discord bot. Found under https://discord.com/developers/applications.

properties.name: slotbot.discord.guild
properties.description: The id of the discord guild the bot runs in.
